select count(*) from noback_board
where upper(board_title) like '%' || upper(#{search}) || '%'

select b.board_num , b.board_title , b.board_content , to_char(b.board_date, 'YY/MM/DD') as board_date , m.employee_name as board_writer_name from noback_board b, noback_member m where b.board_writer = m.employee_num
and upper(b.board_title) like '%' || upper(#{search}) || '%'
order by b.board_num desc

select b.board_num , b.board_title , b.board_content , to_char(b.board_date, 'YY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') as board_date , b.board_writer , m.employee_name as board_writer_name from noback_board b, noback_member m where b.board_writer = m.employee_num and board_num = #{num}
